SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Admin
Simple class representing an admin in the system.
AdminRepository
Repository interface for storing and retrieving admins.
AppConfig
AppConfig: sets up the main components of the library system.
AuthService
Simple authentication service for handling admin login and logout.
Book
Represents a book media item in the library.
BookFineStrategy
Fine calculation strategy for books.
BusinessRuleException
Exception thrown when a business rule is violated.
CD
Represents a CD media item in the library.
CDFineStrategy
Fine calculation strategy for CDs.
EmailClient
Simple interface for sending email messages.
EmailMessage
Simple DTO representing an email message.
FakeEmailClient
Fake implementation of EmailClient used for testing.
FineStrategy
General strategy interface for calculating fines.
InMemoryAdminRepository
Simple in-memory implementation of the AdminRepository.
InMemoryLoanRepository
Simple in-memory implementation of the LoanRepository.
InMemoryMediaRepository
Simple in-memory implementation of the MediaRepository.
InMemoryUserRepository
Simple in-memory implementation of the UserRepository.
LibraryService
Main service class for the library.
LibraryServiceTest
Comprehensive tests for LibraryService.
Loan
Represents a loan operation in the library.
LoanRepository
Repository interface for storing and retrieving loan records.
Main
Main entry point for the console-based library application.
Media
Base class for all media items in the library (e.g., books, CDs).
MediaRepository
Repository interface for managing media items (books, CDs, etc.).
NotAuthorizedException
Exception thrown when an action requires admin privileges.
OverdueReport
Holds overdue information grouped by user.
ReminderService
Service responsible for building overdue reports and sending reminders.
ReminderService.Notifier
Notifier: functional interface used to perform notification for a user.
ReminderServiceTest
Unit tests for ReminderService.
ResourceNotFoundException
Exception thrown when a requested resource cannot be found.
SystemTimeProvider
Default implementation of TimeProvider that simply returns the system's current date.
TimeProvider
Simple abstraction for providing the current date.
User
Represents a regular user in the library system.
UserRepository
Repository interface for managing user records.
